data.title: Russian author Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn has won the 1970 Nobel Prize for Literature. Pic Stock Photo
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: Oct. 08, 1970 - Russian author Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn has won the 1970 Nobel Prize for Literature.  Pic - E0YMCB from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
data.text:
You can only use this image in editorial media and for personal use. Editorial media includes use as a visual reference to support your article, story, critique or educational text. Personal use allows you to make a single personal print, card or gift for non-commercial use. Not for resale.
